sentence: Could you rotate the knob counter-clockwise to adjust the settings?
Could you rotate the knob Anticlockwise to adjust the settings?
After finishing your meal, please throw the cup in the trash can.
After finishing your meal, Kindly throw the cup in the Dustbin.
I forgot my wallet at home and had to borrow some cash.
I forgot my Purse at home and had to borrow some cash.
The teacher said, 'Do what is needed to complete the project on time.'
The teacher said, 'Do the needful to complete the project on time.'
We need to get back to the office before lunch.
We need to Avail back to the office before lunch.
I got a flat tire on my scooter while heading to the gas station.
I got a Puncture on my Two-wheeler while heading to the Petrol Bunk.
She was out of town during her wedding anniversary last week.
She was Out of station during her Marriage anniversary last week.
I’m still memorizing all the states and capitals for the quiz tomorrow.
I’m still Mugging up all the states and capitals for the quiz tomorrow.
Let’s jump the line; we’re running late for the movie!
Let’s Cut the queue; we’re running late for the movie!
I left my thumb drive at the computer lab again.
I left my Pen Drive at the System lab again.
Do you know the zip code for this area?
Do you know the PIN code for this area?
The cafeteria was offering free yogurt samples during lunch today.
The Canteen was offering free Curd samples during lunch today.
My job title just changed after I got promoted last month.
My Designation just changed after I got promoted last month.
He graduated at the top of his class and was offered a great partnership deal.
He Passed out at the top of his class and was offered a great Tie-up deal.
The picture on the rate card was very misleading.
The Snap on the Tariff was very misleading.
She gave her best effort but still found the exam extremely difficult to take.
She gave it her best shot, but the exam was a real brain-twister.
I’ll do my best to meet the deadline, but it’s a tight schedule.
I’ll do Level Best to meet the deadline, but it’s a tight schedule.
Is there a haircut salon nearby, or should we look for one online?
Is there a Saloon nearby, or should we look for one online?
The motorcycle sped past us as if the road was empty.
The motorBike sped past us as if the road was empty.
After waiting in a line of people for an hour, she finally got her coffee.
After waiting in Queue for an hour, she finally got her coffee.
He asked a question during the presentation that left everyone thinking.
He asked a thoughtful question during the presentation, which left everyone thinking
The computer crashed right before I saved my work—what a waste of time!
The computer crashed right before I saved my work—Time waste, na!
He gave me a strong slap on the back when he heard I got the promotion.
He gave me a tight slap on the back when he heard I got the promotion.
